mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT a.ifcgSeq ,a.ifcgNameEng ,a.ifcgNameKor ,a.ifcgRegDatetime ,a.ifcgModDatetime ,(select count(bb.ifccSeq) from infrCommonCode bb where bb.infrCodeGroup_ifcgSeq = a.ifcgSeq) as codeCnt FROM infrCodeGroup a INNER JOIN infrCommonCode b on a.ifcgSeq = b.infrCodeGroup_ifcgSeq WHERE 1=1
AND a.icfgNameKor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.ifcgRegDatetime BETWEEN date(#{shStartDate}) AND date(#{shEndDate})
AND a.ifcgModDatetime BETWEEN date(#{shStartDate}) AND date(#{shEndDate})
ORDER BY a.ifcgSeq ASC
ORDER BY a.ifcgRegDatetime ASC
ORDER BY a.ifcgModDatetime ASC
LIMIT 20
LIMIT 30
LIMIT 10
